movie.title: War of Art
movie.description_intro: Artists from across the Western world visit North Korea to take part in a "cultural exchange" - with varying degrees of success and failure.
movie.description_full: Artists from across the Western world visit North Korea to take part in a "cultural exchange" - with varying degrees of success and failure.

movies.title: La villa Santo Sospir
movies.summary: Short about Mrs. Weisweiller's Villa in Saint-Jean-Cap-Ferat, on Côte d'Azur, which was decorated by Jean Cocteau.
movies.description_full: Short about Mrs. Weisweiller's Villa in Saint-Jean-Cap-Ferat, on Côte d'Azur, which was decorated by Jean Cocteau.
movies.synopsis: Short about Mrs. Weisweiller's Villa in Saint-Jean-Cap-Ferat, on Côte d'Azur, which was decorated by Jean Cocteau.

movies.title: Echo in the Canyon
movies.summary: A look at the roots of the historic music scene in L.A.'s Laurel Canyon featuring the music of iconic groups such as The Byrds, The Beach Boys, Buffalo Springfield, and The Mamas and the Papas.
movies.description_full: A look at the roots of the historic music scene in L.A.'s Laurel Canyon featuring the music of iconic groups such as The Byrds, The Beach Boys, Buffalo Springfield, and The Mamas and the Papas.
movies.synopsis: A look at the roots of the historic music scene in L.A.'s Laurel Canyon featuring the music of iconic groups such as The Byrds, The Beach Boys, Buffalo Springfield, and The Mamas and the Papas.

movies.title: Tiny Giants 3D
movies.summary: From the ancient forests of North America to the legendary Sonoran desert, a diverse world of wild, mysterious and remarkable animals exists hidden in plain sight. But, the magnificent indigenous mammals are utterly unaware that beneath their hooves and paws lies a microcosm of elusive and extraordinary tiny creatures. With this in mind, this is the exciting story of an adventurous young chipmunk and a caring grasshopper-mouse mother--two minuscule beings dwelling in a world of titans. As a result, the battle for survival in such an unforgiving environment takes on a completely new meaning, especially when you are a few inches tall. In other words, a true tiny giant.

movies.title: Oasis: Supersonic
movies.summary: Oasis's breakthrough years documented into a detailed depiction of the infamous brothers from Manchester forming the band in the early 90's leading up to the legendary performance at Knebworth.
